ProductInfo.Features:
Built-in 1/3" SONY Exview CCD II EFFIO-E DSP image sensor; 700 TV lines
Built in f 8-20mm Vari-focal lens. 65 Infrared LEDs for night vision
Water, dust and crush resistant glass coating, weatherproof housing. IP66
Cable through bracket protects the camera from vandalism
Package included: 4 of Sony Color CCD day night cameras, 4 of 12V DC power supplies and 4 of security warning stickers
